description: A Sudanese refugee is in custody after shoppers were attacked in the town of Romans-sur-Is¨¨re.
title: Romans-sur-Is¨¨re: France launches terror probe after knife attack
title_page: Romans-sur-Is¨¨re: France launches terror probe after knife attack - BBC News
maintext: The butcher's shop owner, Ludovic Breyton, said: "He took a knife, jumped over the counter, and stabbed a customer, then ran away. My wife tried to help the victim but in vain."
